La dea fortuna
programme.desc:
La dea fortuna: Directed by Ferzan Ozpetek. With Stefano Accorsi, Jasmine Trinca, Edoardo Leo, Serra Yilmaz. When Annamaria, a longtime friend of Alessandro and Arturo, asks the couple to take care of her children, the relationship between the two men reaches a point of no return." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10256570/","name":"La dea fortuna","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQ0OTlmYjctNDc1NC00NDc1LWFiM2EtZWUzZTE3MTUwNTNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzIzNDU1NTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Annamaria, a longtime friend of Alessandro and Arturo, asks the couple to take care of her children, the relationship between the two men reaches a point of no return.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10256570/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"yusufpiskin"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pure Beauty","reviewBody":"It is a Ferzan Özpetek film with the beauty we are used to, but it still has features that distinguish it from his films. For example, Ferzan used child actors for the first time, which has a great impact on the texture of the film, both young actors.

It is a pity that it was not screened in many countries of the world, including Turkey. The blu-ray copy that came out in Europe is beautifully crafted.

The movie reminded me that I miss Ferzan the most. It's been 4 years since I've seen him. Maybe one day I'll get a Blu-Ray copy of this movie signed as well.

While even Blockbuster films were heavily affected by the covid-19 process, such naive films unfortunately boiled away.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1832,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-12-19","keywords":"friend,gay,gay couple,marital crisis,infidelity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4219846425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzI4N2NjNzMtM2QzOC00ZDM5LTk0OTgtM2U5NDJjNDgyZDRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzI4N2NjNzMtM2QzOC00ZDM5LTk0OTgtM2U5NDJjNDgyZDRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0009629/","name":"Stefano Accorsi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0872910/","name":"Jasmine Trinca"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0502412/","name":"Edoardo Leo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654858/","name":"Ferzan Ozpetek"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0021904/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0278508/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654858/","name":"Ferzan Ozpetek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710011/","name":"Silvia Ranfagni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0739744/","name":"Gianni Romoli"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Polska z góry. Zamki, dworki, pałace
Polska z góry. Zamki, dworki, pałace
Lincoln
Lincoln
programme.desc: Lincoln: Directed by Steven Spielberg. With Daniel Day-Lewis, Sally Field, David Strathairn, Joseph Gordon-Levitt. As the American Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0443272/","name":"Lincoln","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzNzczMDUyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjM2ODEzOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the American Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0443272/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"littlemartinarocena"},"dateCreated":"2012-11-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Daniel Day Lewis Factor","reviewBody":"I remember fondly, Henry Fonda and Raymond Massey as Lincolns in "Young Mr.Lincoln" and "Abe Lincoln in Illinois" They gave remarkable performances. But, here and now in this extraordinary Steven Spielberg/Tony Kushner version, the illusion is complete. I was watching the president and not for a moment thought of the actor. That in itself is close to unique. I left the theater with the feeling I've just had an out of body experience. Everything around the central performance - and I call it a performance because I don't know what else to call it - falls into place in a miraculous way. The photography, the production design, the wardrobe made it possible to actually smell the period. IMDb data; ttnr: 0443272, Title: Lincoln, --- Description: Lincoln: Directed by Steven Spielberg. With Daniel Day-Lewis, Sally Field, David Strathairn, Joseph Gordon-Levitt. As the American Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0443272/","name":"Lincoln","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzNzczMDUyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjM2ODEzOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the American Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0443272/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"littlemartinarocena","dateCreated":"2012-11-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Daniel Day Lewis Factor","reviewBody":"I remember fondly, Henry Fonda and Raymond Massey as Lincolns in "Young Mr.Lincoln" and "Abe Lincoln in Illinois" They gave remarkable performances. But, here and now in this extraordinary Steven Spielberg/Tony Kushner version, the illusion is complete. I was watching the president and not for a moment thought of the actor. That in itself is close to unique. I left the theater with the feeling I've just had an out of body experience. Everything around the central performance - and I call it a performance because I don't know what else to call it - falls into place in a miraculous way. The photography, the production design, the wardrobe made it possible to actually smell the period. Congratulations and thank you.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":252568,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2013-02-20","keywords":"based on real person,1860s,american civil war,politics,cultural conflict","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Winner: Best Actor","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi759866393","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2MzYzOTY4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDE5OTA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2MzYzOTY4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDE5OTA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield and as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000358/","name":"Daniel Day-Lewis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000398/","name":"Sally Field","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000657/","name":"David Strathairn"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000229/","name":"Steven Spielberg"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0336601/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1065785/","name":"Tony Kushner","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0329447/","name":"Doris Kearns Goodwin"],"duration":"PT2H30M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Catcher Was a Spy
Projekt Larson
The Catcher Was a Spy
programme.desc: The Catcher Was a Spy: Directed by Ben Lewin. With Paul Rudd, Pierfrancesco Favino, Tom Wilkinson, Connie Nielsen. Former Major League Baseball player Moe Berg goes undercover in World War II Europe for the Office of Strategic Services." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4602066/","name":"The Catcher Was a Spy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODhlNDc0ZTQtN2FiOS00OGRiLWE2YmYtZmI2ZmU1NzM5MmJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODY3Nzc0OTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Former Major League Baseball player Moe Berg goes undercover in World War II Europe for the Office of Strategic Services.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4602066/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jakob13"},"dateCreated":"2018-07-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"The spy who never came in from the cold","reviewBody":"Ben Lewin has brought Nicholas Dawidoff 1994 biography about the mysterious Moe Berg. And Moe Berg remained a mystery until he died. Here's food for thought: when you think of Jews in baseball Moe Berg's name doesn't easily come to mind. Hank Grrenberg, yes. Sandy Kofax, for sure. Not Moe Berg who played for the Boston Red Sox during the 20s and the 30s. 'The Catcher was a Spy' is a conventional film with a fascinating 'hero': a polyglot, a polymath, born of Eastern Europeans Jews who settled in Harlem. And yet, Berg, played by a charming Paul Rudd who like his character celebrates tight lip secrecy. It is to Rudd's credit to have learned smatterings of six or seven languages to give body to his character who know many, many more. Berg graduated summa laude from Princeton when few Jews could attend. A lawyer from Columbia law who passed the bar before he finished his degree. Yet baseball was his life as was spying. The script writers give short shift to the spy Berg when he went to Japan with an all-star team that included Babe Ruth. We get the idea Berg dresses up as a Japanese in full kimono, armed with a camera films from the roof of a hospital Tokyo Harbor which had a dual use as a military facility. It would have taken too much to explain the prewar politics and the role of Japan invading Manchuria, testing America's and European empires' turf in Asia. So, although Berg was acting on behalf of a rudimentary US spy agency, Lewin's script white washes it as an act of a patriot. There is a 'love' story, but beneath the surface the film there is a flaw, a 'moral flaw' for the time. Was Berg queer? Probably. A scene of a night visit to the waterfront frequented by men, and non reputable bars frequented soley by men. Now to the film: Wild Bill Donovan, founder of the OSS, predecessor to the CIA, recruits Berg after Pearl Harbor. Donovan asks him if he's queer. And without a beat, Rudd replies, 'I know how to keep secrets'; to which Donovan replies, I don't care wo a man f--ks, I'm only interested if he's wants us to win the war'. Berg's assignment is to kill Werner Heisenberg, father of the German nuclear bomb. And here the film takes wings...and a high moment of the 'Catcher was a Spy' is when Rudd and Strong play mental chess, to fathom have the Germans the bomb. And here we see Berg has a dialectical frame of mind, he's willing to spare Heisenberg for an answer that Germany's nuclear project is not very advanced. (Heisenberg is the object of an award winning play "Copenhagen' that infers Heisenberg purposefully delayed Hitler's plans for a nuclear weapon.) The camera turns all over the place Japan, Italy, New York and Switzerland. Long shots, close shots, it runs the full alphabet of film making. Rudd speaks his languages fairly well with a good accent, but slips briefly when it comes to French. There is nothing dramatically wrong, but the film never plumbs the secretive Moe Berg. At the end we are told Berg never married and spent time in libraries. And yet he never left the CIAin mind and spirit and died the loner he was.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8951,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2018-06-22","keywords":"espionage,spy,baseball,baseball player,boston red sox","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2587998233","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5N2JmYmMtNzQzNy00N2E5LWJhZjktMDQ5YmFmYjI4ZDE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5N2JmYmMtNzQzNy00N2E5LWJhZjktMDQ5YmFmYjI4ZDE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Catcher Was a Spy tells the true story of Morris "Moe" Berg (Paul Rudd), the Major League Baseball player, Ivy League graduate, attorney and top-secret spy who helped the U.S. defeat Nazi Germany in the race to build the atomic bomb."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0748620/","name":"Paul Rudd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0269419/","name":"Pierfrancesco Favino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929489/","name":"Tom Wilkinson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506802/","name":"Ben Lewin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037203/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092860/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0240363/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0734441/","name":"Robert Rodat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7260546/","name":"Nicholas Dawidoff"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Songbird
Songbird. Rozdzieleni
Songbird
programme.desc: Songbird: Directed by Adam Mason. With K.J. Apa, Sofia Carson, Craig Robinson, Bradley Whitford. In 2024 a pandemic ravages the world and its cities. Centering on a handful of people as they navigate the obstacles currently hindering society: disease, martial law, quarantine, and vigilantes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12592252/","name":"Songbird","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDA1MTYxNjctYjQyOS00OTQ2LWFkNGMtMmZkNDg0ZDNjNDYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjY1MTg4Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 2024 a pandemic ravages the world and its cities. Centering on a handful of people as they navigate the obstacles currently hindering society: disease, martial law, quarantine, and vigilantes.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12592252/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fortunefox"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining!","reviewBody":"Ok so it's not Oscar material but that being said it was really good! It was thrilling and it kept my attention. In this age of Covid this movie is a must see. I'm glad I didn't listen to the reviews. I also liked the love story plot...and the character relationships that show how the virus can either bring people together or tear them apart. It can bring out the best in some people or the worst.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8479,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-12-11","keywords":"older man younger woman kiss,older man younger woman affair,2020s,pandemic,quarantine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1508884761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODM1OGE5NjMtZTgxMy00OGRiLTk1OWQtMWJmMjQ5NjgxZWFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODM1OGE5NjMtZTgxMy00OGRiLTk1OWQtMWJmMjQ5NjgxZWFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four years into quarantine the virus has changed and so have we... \n \nThe COVID-23 virus has mutated and the world is in its fourth year of lockdown. Infected Americans are ripped from their homes and forced into quarantine camps known as Q-Zones, from which there is no escape, as a few brave souls fight back against the forces of oppression. Amid this dystopian landscape, a fearless courier, Nico (KJ Apa), who's immune to the deadly pathogen, finds hope and love with Sara (Sofia Carson), though her lockdown prohibits them from physical contact. When Sara is believed to have become infected, Nico races desperately across the barren streets of Los Angeles in search of the only thing that can save her from imprisonment ... or worse."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6216001/","name":"K.J. Apa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6259860/","name":"Sofia Carson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0732497/","name":"Craig Robinson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0556573/","name":"Adam Mason"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0699213/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0807703/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071240/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0556573/","name":"Adam Mason"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1899220/","name":"Simon Boyes"}],"duration":"PT1H24M"}</script><metacontent="

A bride's wedding night takes a sinister turn when her eccentric new in-laws force her to take part in a terrifying game." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7798634/","name":"Ready or Not","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzBkMzAyMDUtZTFkZS00OWUyLTgwM2ItNGI3MTQ5NzA3NTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A bride's wedding night takes a sinister turn when her eccentric new in-laws force her to take part in a terrifying game.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7798634/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TreasureHunterGirl"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lots of gore and laughs","reviewBody":"Yes, it is a horror. Yes, it is a comedy. Yes, it is a great watch.

I laughed a lot watching this movie. I also cringed a few times from the gorey horror. I didn't know much about it going in. I honestly couldn't pick how it would end which means I was interested the whole way through.

I liked all of the performances, especially those of Samara Weaving and Adam Brody. They had interesting characters. Andie MacDowell and Henry Czerny were great too. Everyone was. No one let the team down.

I really enjoyed this movie. I honestly don't understand all the 1 and 2 ratings. Even if you didn't like it, it doesn't deserve that low of a rating. It was just a really fun movie to watch. Give it a chance.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":129273,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2019-08-21","keywords":"hide and seek,evil rich family,dark family secret,shot in the hand,dysfunctional family","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ready or Not","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi703381273","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmQxMGJiN2QtNzUwMy00MmMxLTg4NzAtYTI5NjUwZWU2MjA3XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmQxMGJiN2QtNzUwMy00MmMxLTg4NzAtYTI5NjUwZWU2MjA3XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3034977/","name":"Samara Weaving"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111013/","name":"Adam Brody"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1975628/","name":"Mark O'Brien"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2366012/","name":"Matt Bettinelli-Olpin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2419470/","name":"Tyler Gillett"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028932/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0321082/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0349223/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2361509/","name":"Guy Busick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1459583/","name":"R. programme.title: Smoke
Dym
Smoke
programme.desc: Smoke: Directed by Wayne Wang. With Giancarlo Esposito, José Zúñiga, Stephen Gevedon, Harvey Keitel. A Brooklyn smoke shop is the center of neighborhood activity, and the stories of its customers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114478/","name":"Smoke","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjUwYTdiYjItNTgzNS00MmQ3LWJlMDctODMyNTkxMjIxMDgwL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA0MjU0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Brooklyn smoke shop is the center of neighborhood activity, and the stories of its customers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"coop-16"},"dateCreated":"2000-04-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"A quiet masterpiece of the cinema","reviewBody":"I cannot begin to convey the intellectual and spiritual riches of this exquisite, almost transcendental film. I have rarely seen a motion picture with better acting or a more literate, insightful script.Harvey Keitel, John Hurt, Stockard Channing, Ashley Judd, Forrest Whittaker, and all the other players contribute some of their finest performances.The film itself ends with a "Christmas story' which conveys more of the religious-and humanist-meaning of that holiday than a thousand scmaltzy TV specials.Watch this movie, watch it carefully. Rarely has the beauty and sublimity concealed behind the facade of quotidian existence been better conveyed in a film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35362,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1995-06-09","keywords":"smoke,cigarette smoking,death of wife,year 1990,summer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Smoke","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2536243225","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE3MWZjN2EtMTRjMi00MjFiLWI5NWUtNjJmOTFlMGM0ZDJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE3MWZjN2EtMTRjMi00MjFiLWI5NWUtNjJmOTFlMGM0ZDJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Miramax"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000172/","name":"Harvey Keitel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000458/","name":"William Hurt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002064/","name":"Giancarlo Esposito"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911061/","name":"Wayne Wang"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055105/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070053/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000808/","name":"Paul Auster"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

A Brooklyn smoke shop is the center of neighborhood activity, and the stories of its customers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114478/","name":"Smoke","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjUwYTdiYjItNTgzNS00MmQ3LWJlMDctODMyNTkxMjIxMDgwL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA0MjU0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Brooklyn smoke shop is the center of neighborhood activity, and the stories of its customers.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114478/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"coop-16","dateCreated":"2000-04-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"A quiet masterpiece of the cinema","reviewBody":"I cannot begin to convey the intellectual and spiritual riches of this exquisite, almost transcendental film. I have rarely seen a motion picture with better acting or a more literate, insightful script.Harvey Keitel, John Hurt, Stockard Channing, Ashley Judd, Forrest Whittaker, and all the other players contribute some of their finest performances.The film itself ends with a "Christmas story' which conveys more of the religious-and humanist-meaning of that holiday than a thousand scmaltzy TV specials.Watch this movie, watch it carefully. Rarely has the beauty and sublimity concealed behind the facade of quotidian existence been better conveyed in a film.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35362,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1995-06-09","keywords":"smoke,cigarette smoking,death of wife,year 1990,summer","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Smoke","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2536243225","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE3MWZjN2EtMTRjMi00MjFiLWI5NWUtNjJmOTFlMGM0ZDJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE3MWZjN2EtMTRjMi00MjFiLWI5NWUtNjJmOTFlMGM0ZDJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Miramax","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000172/","name":"Harvey Keitel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000458/","name":"William Hurt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002064/","name":"Giancarlo Esposito"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911061/","name":"Wayne Wang"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055105/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070053/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000808/","name":"Paul Auster"],"duration":"PT1H52M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Everest
Everest
programme.desc: Everest: Directed by Baltasar Kormákur. With Jason Clarke, Ang Phula Sherpa, Thomas M. Wright, Martin Henderson. The story of New Zealand's Robert "Rob" Edwin Hall, who on May 10, 1996, together with Scott Fischer, teamed up on a joint expedition to ascend Mount Everest." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2719848/","name":"Everest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTNmMzM0ZTktZWY3Yy00ODViLTllZDgtODcwM2QyM2E2YTU2L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of New Zealand's Robert "Rob" Edwin Hall, who on May 10, 1996, together with Scott Fischer, teamed up on a joint expedition to ascend Mount Everest.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2719848/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"valleyjohn"},"dateCreated":"2015-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very immersive disaster movie.","reviewBody":"This is the true story of two different expeditions in 1996 who attempt to scale Everest but encounter massive storms on the descent down the mountain. Everest is a stunning looking film that you come away from , feeling totally exhausted. Because it is so realistic you do feel you are with the climbers at times. Sure , it's a stock disaster movie but because of the nature of the true story behind it , you feel more connected. The special affects are amazing and the performances from Jason Clarke and Keira Knightley are great too. I watched this in 3D but ended up taking the glasses off because it was so annoyingly dark so i recommend watching it in 2D instead. It's a staggering statistic that 1 in 4 people who attempt to get get to the summit of Everest , dies. Why do people do it? that question is asked in this film but apart from the stock answer of " Because it's there" it is never really answered . Perhaps there isn't one?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":208705,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Biography"],"datePublished":"2015-09-16","keywords":"mount everest,mountain climbing,survival,mountain,man versus nature","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"IMAX Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1946006297","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NjUxNDE3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDE1OTY0NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NjUxNDE3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDE1OTY0NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Inspired by the incredible events surrounding an attempt to reach the summit of the world's highest mountain, Everest documents the awe-inspiring journey of two different expeditions challenged beyond their limits by one of the fiercest snowstorms ever encountered by mankind. Their mettle tested by the harshest elements found on the planet, the climbers will face nearly impossible obstacles as a lifelong obsession becomes a breathtaking struggle for survival."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0164809/","name":"Jason Clarke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7583273/","name":"Ang Phula Sherpa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0942876/","name":"Thomas M. Wright"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0466349/","name":"Baltasar Kormákur"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057311/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0450900/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073388/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629933/","name":"William Nicholson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0064479/","name":"Simon Beaufoy"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Motherless Brooklyn
Osierocony Brooklyn
Motherless Brooklyn
programme.desc: Motherless Brooklyn: Directed by Edward Norton. With Edward Norton, Gugu Mbatha-Raw, Alec Baldwin, Willem Dafoe. In 1950s New York, a lonely private detective afflicted with Tourette's Syndrome ventures to solve the murder of his mentor and only friend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0385887/","name":"Motherless Brooklyn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQ0Mjk1YjItNWI1Ny00NWE2LWFlYTAtYjViY2YzMTVlOGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1950s New York, a lonely private detective afflicted with Tourette's Syndrome ventures to solve the murder of his mentor and only friend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0385887/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gwen_chavarria"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just One Problem","reviewBody":"I found this film satisfying overall, but one anachronism distracted me and pulled me out of the 1950s setting. Lionel's symptoms of Tourette's syndrome, repetitive verbalizations of a rhyming nature, were accepted equanimously by everyone he encountered. No one displayed annoyance, made fun of him, or called him insulting names to cast aspersions about his intelligence. His repetitive touching of people on the shoulder as he faced them ought to have caused women to back away and men to knock his block off. They did neither. It was as if these 1950s characters had been taught the acceptance of people with disabilities that was not really commonplace until the 21st century. This is the biggest mystery in the movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51203,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-11-01","keywords":"neo noir,1950s,jazz music,based on novel,detective","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi800112409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQ2YjJlYWItNjQxMi00ZWNjLTgxNjAtMzc4NTRmZjI3NTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQ2YjJlYWItNjQxMi00ZWNjLTgxNjAtMzc4NTRmZjI3NTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set against the backdrop of 1950s New York, 'Motherless Brooklyn' follows Lionel Essrog (Edward Norton), a private detective living with Tourette Syndrome, as he ventures to solve the murder of his mentor and only friend, Frank Minna (Bruce Willis). Armed only with a few clues and the engine of his obsessive mind, Lionel unravels closely-guarded secrets that hold the fate of the whole city in the balance. In a mystery that carries him from gin-soaked jazz clubs in Harlem to the hard-edged slums of Brooklyn and, finally, into the gilded halls of New York's power brokers, Lionel contends with thugs, corruption and the most dangerous man in the city to honor his friend and save the woman who might be his own salvation."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001570/","name":"Edward Norton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1813221/","name":"Gugu Mbatha-Raw"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000285/","name":"Alec Baldwin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001570/","name":"Edward Norton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0456097/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113781/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113140/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001570/","name":"Edward Norton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0504672/","name":"Jonathan Lethem"}],"duration":"PT2H24M"}</script><metacontent="

His repetitive touching of people on the shoulder as he faced them ought to have caused women to back away and men to knock his block off. They did neither. It was as if these 1950s characters had been taught the acceptance of people with disabilities that was not really commonplace until the 21st century. This is the biggest mystery in the movie.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51203,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-11-01","keywords":"neo noir,1950s,jazz music,based on novel,detective","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi800112409","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQ2YjJlYWItNjQxMi00ZWNjLTgxNjAtMzc4NTRmZjI3NTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQ2YjJlYWItNjQxMi00ZWNjLTgxNjAtMzc4NTRmZjI3NTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set against the backdrop of 1950s New York, 'Motherless Brooklyn' follows Lionel Essrog (Edward Norton), a private detective living with Tourette Syndrome, as he ventures to solve the murder of his mentor and only friend, Frank Minna (Bruce Willis). Armed only with a few clues and the engine of his obsessive mind, Lionel unravels closely-guarded secrets that hold the fate of the whole city in the balance. In a mystery that carries him from gin-soaked jazz clubs in Harlem to the hard-edged slums of Brooklyn and, finally, into the gilded halls of New York's power brokers, Lionel contends with thugs, corruption and the most dangerous man in the city to honor his friend and save the woman who might be his own salvation.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001570/","name":"Edward Norton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1813221/","name":"Gugu Mbatha-Raw","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000285/","name":"Alec Baldwin"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001570/","name":"Edward Norton"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0456097/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113781/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113140/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001570/","name":"Edward Norton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0504672/","name":"Jonathan Lethem"],"duration":"PT2H24M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
Sekretne życie Waltera Mitty
The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
programme.desc: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty: Directed by Ben Stiller. With Ben Stiller, Kristen Wiig, Jon Daly, Kathryn Hahn. When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he could have ever imagined." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0359950/","name":"The Secret Life of Walter Mitty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODYwNDYxNDk1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAwMTk2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he could have ever imagined.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0359950/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CalRhys"},"dateCreated":"2014-07-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"An Utterly Mesmerising Spectacle","reviewBody":"'Tropic Thunder', 'The Cable Guy', 'Zoolander'... Ben Stiller has created some entertaining comedies, but 'Walter Mitty' is by far his most audacious piece of direction so far. The story is solid and the cinematography is stunning, Stiller has created an utterly mesmerising spectacle that follows the same basis of the 1947 classic starring Danny Kaye. Whilst I found the majority of the film charming and entertaining, it's the beautiful cinematography from Stuart Dryburgh that really sells this flick, and in my opinion should have been worthy of an Oscar- nomination at the least. One of the most entertaining comedy-dramas I have seen in recent years, a film that Stiller should be proud of."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":304424,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-12-25","keywords":"life magazine,magazine,photographer,daydream,x rayed skeleton","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3628050457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM2NDMyNDUwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjg4MjY2MDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM2NDMyNDUwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjg4MjY2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A day-dreamer escapes his anonymous life by disappearing into a world of fantasies filled with heroism, romance and action. When his job along with that of his co-worker are threatened, he takes action in the real world embarking on a global journey that turns into an adventure more extraordinary than anything he could have ever imagined. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1325419/","name":"Kristen Wiig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1789985/","name":"Jon Daly"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0058013/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175726/","name":"Steve Conrad"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0862122/","name":"James Thurber"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Gladiator
Gladiator
programme.desc: Gladiator: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen, Oliver Reed. A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0172495/","name":"Gladiator","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDliMmNhNDEtODUyOS00MjNlLTgxODEtN2U3NzIxMGVkZTA1L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0172495/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"copperccso"},"dateCreated":"2002-09-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the Greatest Movies Ever","reviewBody":"I love history, and to me, Gladiator is a masterpiece. It is the most accurate picture of the Roman Empire Hollywood has ever put out. People declare Spartacus a masterpiece, but Gladiator far outdoes Spartacus in quality. The costuming, the acting, the screenplay, the scenery, and the fighting styles made me think that I had traveled back to 180 A.D. Russell Crowe is a true Hollywood tough guy, and he is superb in this movie. Joaquin Phoenix is outstanding as a villain, one of the best in movie history. He played his character as if it were a psychologist's dream case. Connie Nielsen plays one of the strongest female characters that I have ever seen. The choreographer of the action sequences was brilliant. Ridley Scott did an outstanding job in recreating the Empire, including the multitude of ethnic groups within the Empire and accurately depicting everyday life. If you're looking for insight into what the Roman Empire was like, this is a perfect depiction."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1405559,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2000-05-31","keywords":"roman empire,slavery,combat,battlefield,mother son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2628367897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NTQ0OTkyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQzMjIwMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NTQ0OTkyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQzMjIwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000128/","name":"Russell Crowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001618/","name":"Joaquin Phoenix"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001567/","name":"Connie Nielsen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0291905/","name":"David Franzoni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0517589/","name":"John Logan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629933/","name":"William Nicholson"}],"duration":"PT2H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Oleg
Oleg
programme.desc:
Oleg: Directed by Juris Kursietis. With Valentin Novopolskij, Dawid Ogrodnik, Anna Próchniak, Guna Zarina. A young Latvian butcher travels to Brussels in search of better wage but a series of misfortunes lead him to fall under the sway of a Polish criminal." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7714770/","name":"Oleg","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTRmNzQ1YmItZjdiMC00ODZhLTk5ZTAtNjI1NTAwZGE1OTI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDE1MTYxNjk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Latvian butcher travels to Brussels in search of better wage but a series of misfortunes lead him to fall under the sway of a Polish criminal.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7714770/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MarcoParzivalRocha"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"The life of many migrants","reviewBody":"Oleg, a young man from Latvia, travels to Brussels in search of a better life, however, a series of misfortunes causes him to fall into the hands of an unscrupulous criminal.

Although the pertinent and very current message, Oleg fails in some certain points, and because of that, the film can't reach the high level, so to speak, lacking the reflective and emotional tone, but still, the film leaves interesting notes along the way.

The narrative focus on a story that is not new, of someone looking for something more in life, especially at the financial level, subjecting himself to exploitation and abuse.

It's the point of view from the citizens of the East Europe, and how the most advanced European countries treat "outsiders", and how acceptance and integration are mere illusions for them.

The cinematography adopts a style similar to a documentary, with very closed shots, giving a feeling of claustrophobia and constant pursuit, which works well.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":838,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-10-04","keywords":"immigrant,butcher,mob,brussels belgium","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3239511/","name":"Valentin Novopolskij"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4221607/","name":"Dawid Ogrodnik"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4452669/","name":"Anna Próchniak"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3302367/","name":"Juris Kursietis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0477054/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0213940/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0403374/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9550101/","name":"Liga Celma-Kursiete"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3302367/","name":"Juris Kursietis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1213663/","name":"Kaspars Odins"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

Summer 1998, Kabul in ruins is occupied by the Taliban. In love despite the daily violence and misery, Mohsen and Zunaira want to believe in the future. But a senseless act by Mohsen will upset their lives forever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7534102/","name":"Les hirondelles de Kaboul","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWY1ZTMxNDktYThjMi00YmMzLWE3YmQtMDU3ZTc1ZjBhNTkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Summer 1998, Kabul in ruins is occupied by the Taliban. But a senseless act by Mohsen will upset their lives forever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7534102/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"snowmalamute"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Resonance","reviewBody":"The fact that this is an animation doesn't make it any easier to imagine what the situation is like for the characters. programme.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
Sekretne życie Waltera Mitty
The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
programme.desc: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty: Directed by Ben Stiller. With Ben Stiller, Kristen Wiig, Jon Daly, Kathryn Hahn. When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he could have ever imagined." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0359950/","name":"The Secret Life of Walter Mitty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODYwNDYxNDk1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAwMTk2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he could have ever imagined.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0359950/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CalRhys"},"dateCreated":"2014-07-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"An Utterly Mesmerising Spectacle","reviewBody":"'Tropic Thunder', 'The Cable Guy', 'Zoolander'... Ben Stiller has created some entertaining comedies, but 'Walter Mitty' is by far his most audacious piece of direction so far. The story is solid and the cinematography is stunning, Stiller has created an utterly mesmerising spectacle that follows the same basis of the 1947 classic starring Danny Kaye. Whilst I found the majority of the film charming and entertaining, it's the beautiful cinematography from Stuart Dryburgh that really sells this flick, and in my opinion should have been worthy of an Oscar- nomination at the least. One of the most entertaining comedy-dramas I have seen in recent years, a film that Stiller should be proud of."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":304424,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-12-25","keywords":"life magazine,magazine,photographer,daydream,x rayed skeleton","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3628050457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM2NDMyNDUwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjg4MjY2MDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM2NDMyNDUwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjg4MjY2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A day-dreamer escapes his anonymous life by disappearing into a world of fantasies filled with heroism, romance and action. When his job along with that of his co-worker are threatened, he takes action in the real world embarking on a global journey that turns into an adventure more extraordinary than anything he could have ever imagined. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1325419/","name":"Kristen Wiig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1789985/","name":"Jon Daly"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0058013/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175726/","name":"Steve Conrad"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0862122/","name":"James Thurber"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Gladiator
Gladiator
programme.desc: Gladiator: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen, Oliver Reed. A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0172495/","name":"Gladiator","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDliMmNhNDEtODUyOS00MjNlLTgxODEtN2U3NzIxMGVkZTA1L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0172495/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"copperccso"},"dateCreated":"2002-09-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the Greatest Movies Ever","reviewBody":"I love history, and to me, Gladiator is a masterpiece. It is the most accurate picture of the Roman Empire Hollywood has ever put out. People declare Spartacus a masterpiece, but Gladiator far outdoes Spartacus in quality. The costuming, the acting, the screenplay, the scenery, and the fighting styles made me think that I had traveled back to 180 A.D. Russell Crowe is a true Hollywood tough guy, and he is superb in this movie. Joaquin Phoenix is outstanding as a villain, one of the best in movie history. He played his character as if it were a psychologist's dream case. Connie Nielsen plays one of the strongest female characters that I have ever seen. The choreographer of the action sequences was brilliant. Ridley Scott did an outstanding job in recreating the Empire, including the multitude of ethnic groups within the Empire and accurately depicting everyday life. If you're looking for insight into what the Roman Empire was like, this is a perfect depiction."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1405559,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2000-05-31","keywords":"roman empire,slavery,combat,battlefield,mother son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2628367897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NTQ0OTkyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQzMjIwMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NTQ0OTkyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQzMjIwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000128/","name":"Russell Crowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001618/","name":"Joaquin Phoenix"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001567/","name":"Connie Nielsen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0291905/","name":"David Franzoni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0517589/","name":"John Logan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629933/","name":"William Nicholson"}],"duration":"PT2H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Jaskółki z Kabulu
Les hirondelles de Kaboul
programme.desc: Lato 1998 roku, Kabul. Atiq i Mussarat są konserwatywnym małżeństwem przywiązanym do tradycji. On pracuje jako strażnik w zakładzie karnym, ona walczy z poważną chorobą. Zunaira i Mohsen są ich przeciwieństwem. Pod nowymi rządami stracili pracę i z trudem wiążą koniec z końcem. Wkrótce losy tych par się splatają.

programme.title: Last and First Men
Ostatni i pierwsi ludzie
Last and First Men
programme.desc: Last and First Men: Directed by Jóhann Jóhannsson. With Tilda Swinton. Two billion years ahead of us, a future race of humans finds itself on the verge of extinction. Almost all that is left in the world are lone and surreal monuments, beaming their message into the wilderness." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8015444/","name":"Last and First Men","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDZkYWQ1OGItOTRhMi00MzIyLTk4Y2UtNzE1M2JhNmZjMmZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjU5NTg5NzQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two billion years ahead of us, a future race of humans finds itself on the verge of extinction. Almost all that is left in the world are lone and surreal monuments, beaming their message into the wilderness.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8015444/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"joshua169"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not a movie, A classic SF story, as an audio book w/stills","reviewBody":"Another reviewer said it. This is is not a movie which is much of the reason for the dislike. There are no moving images. There is simply panning over still figures while the narrator speaks, telling a classic SF story written in 1939. It's old sf and it has no traditional story either. The story itself is not to everyone's taste so neither is this "visual audio book". The story is not boring to most SF fans, but as a MOVIE, sure it is. Because nothing moves. There are no actors. It's not really a movie at all in the normal sense. programme.title: Mickey and the Bear
Mickey i niedźwiedź
Mickey and the Bear
programme.desc:
Mickey and the Bear: Directed by Annabelle Attanasio. With Camila Morrone, James Badge Dale, Calvin Demba, Ben Rosenfield. Faced with the responsibility to take care of her addict, veteran father, headstrong teen Mickey Peck keeps her household afloat." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9614440/","name":"Mickey and the Bear","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTUzM2NhN2ItM2Q1OS00ZjJlLWIwZDctYjg1MTljOGJiOGQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDExMzMxNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Faced with the responsibility to take care of her addict, veteran father, headstrong teen Mickey Peck keeps her household afloat.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9614440/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lor_"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Zero degrees of freedom","reviewBody":"First-time feature director Annabelle Attanasio gets excellent performances from her cast, led by the talented Camila Morrone and James Badge Dale, but her original screenplay fails to make the grade.

This is a real downer, a depressing slice of life film that injects numerous topical themes, ranging from the fate of damaged war vets, the nation's addiction crisis to problems of caregivers, while failing to develop them fully. Instead we have Morrone as an 18-year-old heroine faced with the difficult choice of staying to care for her hopelessly destructive father or escape to a new life away from him, but by the end of the movie the choice is virtually made for her by taking away all her other options.

Many red herrings are employed by Attanasio in this grim saga, which produces quite a bit of tension, never released for the viewer. There is an element of escapism in that the audience can feel relieved they are not suffering such awful circumstances as the characters endure, but that hardly makes for a recommendation.

As with so many other "film festival fodder" movies, it's designed for consumption by an elite audience of cinephiles. As a card carrying member of that unfortunate group, I wasn't pleased with the blatant visual reference to Truffaut's "400 Blows", not advisable if one wants his or her work to be taken seriously."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1418,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-11-13","keywords":"addiction,war veteran,teenager,caregiver,father daughter relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mickey and the Bear","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3220160281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTQwZDMwMmYtMzY5OC00Y2NiLWIyMzQtMGMxNmU0OWY2OGFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTQwZDMwMmYtMzY5OC00Y2NiLWIyMzQtMGMxNmU0OWY2OGFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6714979/","name":"Camila Morrone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0197647/","name":"James Badge Dale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4694127/","name":"Calvin Demba"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1580890/","name":"Annabelle Attanasio"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0582197/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0697235/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1580890/","name":"Annabelle Attanasio"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

This is a real downer, a depressing slice of life film that injects numerous topical themes, ranging from the fate of damaged war vets, the nation's addiction crisis to problems of caregivers, while failing to develop them fully. Instead we have Morrone as an 18-year-old heroine faced with the difficult choice of staying to care for her hopelessly destructive father or escape to a new life away from him, but by the end of the movie the choice is virtually made for her by taking away all her other options.

Many red herrings are employed by Attanasio in this grim saga, which produces quite a bit of tension, never released for the viewer. programme.title: Good Will Hunting
Buntownik z wyboru
Good Will Hunting
programme.desc:
Good Will Hunting: Directed by Gus Van Sant. With Matt Damon, Ben Affleck, Stellan Skarsgård, John Mighton. Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119217/","name":"Good Will Hunting","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTI0MzcxMTYtZDVkMy00NjY1LTgyMTYtZmUxN2M3NmQ2NWJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119217/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Gath"},"dateCreated":"1999-02-23","inLanguage":"English","name":""Whatever blows your hair back" - This movie does it for me!","reviewBody":"This is the best movie I have seen since the Godfather. Matt Damon and Ben Affleck make a great team...not only as actors, but more impressively as co-writers. Add Robin Williams in perhaps his best role ever (too close to Good Morning Vietnam for me to make the call), and you have a wonderfully entertaining movie.

Ben Affleck is convincing as the best friend to a genius, able to effectively play the joker and the friend who would "lay down in traffic for you". Matt Damon's portrayal of that genius realizing that life has something more to offer than batting cages and bars is equally stunning. And Robin Williams certainly leaves nothing to be desired (except maybe a beard trimmer...).

The most amazing thing about this movie is the writing. Even if the acting were not terrific, this movie still would have made my top ten list. I was captivated from beginning to end.

If you've not seen it, Good Will Hunting is without doubt a "renter", and I think after seeing it, it's one you'll want to own to watch again and again.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":905075,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1998-01-09","keywords":"professor,genius,mathematical genius,loss of wife,friend","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Good Will Hunting","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1281211929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc2MjE1YTItNWIyYy00YTA4LWE1MWMtODA0MDM1NTVlNjcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc2MjE1YTItNWIyYy00YTA4LWE1MWMtODA0MDM1NTVlNjcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000245/","name":"Robin Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001814/","name":"Gus Van Sant"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031032/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093776/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"}],"duration":"PT2H6M"}</script><metacontent="

Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119217/","name":"Good Will Hunting","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTI0MzcxMTYtZDVkMy00NjY1LTgyMTYtZmUxN2M3NmQ2NWJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119217/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Gath","dateCreated":"1999-02-23","inLanguage":"English","name":""Whatever blows your hair back" - This movie does it for me!","reviewBody":"This is the best movie I have seen since the Godfather. Matt Damon and Ben Affleck make a great team...not only as actors, but more impressively as co-writers. Add Robin Williams in perhaps his best role ever (too close to Good Morning Vietnam for me to make the call), and you have a wonderfully entertaining movie.

Ben Affleck is convincing as the best friend to a genius, able to effectively play the joker and the friend who would "lay down in traffic for you". Matt Damon's portrayal of that genius realizing that life has something more to offer than batting cages and bars is equally stunning. And Robin Williams certainly leaves nothing to be desired (except maybe a beard trimmer...).

If you've not seen it, Good Will Hunting is without doubt a "renter", and I think after seeing it, it's one you'll want to own to watch again and again.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":905075,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1998-01-09","keywords":"professor,genius,mathematical genius,loss of wife,friend","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Good Will Hunting","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1281211929","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc2MjE1YTItNWIyYy00YTA4LWE1MWMtODA0MDM1NTVlNjcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc2MjE1YTItNWIyYy00YTA4LWE1MWMtODA0MDM1NTVlNjcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000245/","name":"Robin Williams","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001814/","name":"Gus Van Sant"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031032/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093776/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"],"duration":"PT2H6M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Blades of Glory
Ostrza chwały
Blades of Glory
programme.desc:
Blades of Glory: Directed by Josh Gordon, Will Speck. With Will Ferrell, Jon Heder, Will Arnett, Amy Poehler. In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0445934/","name":"Blades of Glory","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3MDMyMTYxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjk0NzI0MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0445934/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Rogue-32"},"dateCreated":"2007-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"This film actually warrants a sequel!","reviewBody":"From the very first second I laid eyes on the absolutely hilarious poster for this film, in my neighborhood multiplex a few months ago, I knew with extreme certainty that I'd be seeing it the very first week it opened. Caught it on Wednesday and I'm here to say the movie most definitely delivers on the promise of the poster, big time.

Jon Heder finally gets a role he can have some fun with for a change (which hasn't really happened since Napoleon Dynamite), and he's superbly cast as the sheltered and phobic Jimmy MacElroy, the perfect foil for Ferrell's sex machine on skates, Chazz Michael Michaels. Ferrell is fast becoming more and more adept at portraying genuine characters in his movies, not merely hollow caricatures, and he is clearly in his element here.

The beginning of the movie, the set-up, is wonderfully written, and the over-the-top tone that's established in these opening scenes is successfully carried throughout. The energy level stays high, the plot never gets tedious or bogged down, and, best of all, the routines that the two of them perform together as partners are truly hilarious and original. I was left wanting more, and that speaks volumes.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":163428,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Sport"],"datePublished":"2007-05-30","keywords":"homoeroticism,gay interest,lgbt,jock strap,tattooed back","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blades of Glory","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3468296473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTU2YmYxMzUtZDk5Yy00YTU0LWJhMjUtZjY1MjUzMjJhNWIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTU2YmYxMzUtZDk5Yy00YTU0LWJhMjUtZjY1MjUzMjJhNWIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002071/","name":"Will Ferrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1417647/","name":"Jon Heder"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0688132/","name":"Amy Poehler"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0330347/","name":"Josh Gordon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0817447/","name":"Will Speck"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0039303/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158519/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1829796/","name":"Jeff Cox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837763/","name":"Craig Cox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014365/","name":"John Altschuler"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0445934, Title: Blades of Glory, --- Description: Blades of Glory: Directed by Josh Gordon, Will Speck. With Will Ferrell, Jon Heder, Will Arnett, Amy Poehler. In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0445934/","name":"Blades of Glory","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3MDMyMTYxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjk0NzI0MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0445934/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Rogue-32","dateCreated":"2007-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"This film actually warrants a sequel!","reviewBody":"From the very first second I laid eyes on the absolutely hilarious poster for this film, in my neighborhood multiplex a few months ago, I knew with extreme certainty that I'd be seeing it the very first week it opened. Caught it on Wednesday and I'm here to say the movie most definitely delivers on the promise of the poster, big time.

Jon Heder finally gets a role he can have some fun with for a change (which hasn't really happened since Napoleon Dynamite), and he's superbly cast as the sheltered and phobic Jimmy MacElroy, the perfect foil for Ferrell's sex machine on skates, Chazz Michael Michaels. Ferrell is fast becoming more and more adept at portraying genuine characters in his movies, not merely hollow caricatures, and he is clearly in his element here.

The beginning of the movie, the set-up, is wonderfully written, and the over-the-top tone that's established in these opening scenes is successfully carried throughout. The energy level stays high, the plot never gets tedious or bogged down, and, best of all, the routines that the two of them perform together as partners are truly hilarious and original. I was left wanting more, and that speaks volumes.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":163428,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Sport"],"datePublished":"2007-05-30","keywords":"homoeroticism,gay interest,lgbt,jock strap,tattooed back","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blades of Glory","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3468296473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTU2YmYxMzUtZDk5Yy00YTU0LWJhMjUtZjY1MjUzMjJhNWIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTU2YmYxMzUtZDk5Yy00YTU0LWJhMjUtZjY1MjUzMjJhNWIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002071/","name":"Will Ferrell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1417647/","name":"Jon Heder","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0688132/","name":"Amy Poehler"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0330347/","name":"Josh Gordon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0817447/","name":"Will Speck"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0039303/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158519/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1829796/","name":"Jeff Cox","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837763/","name":"Craig Cox","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014365/","name":"John Altschuler"],"duration":"PT1H33M"</script><metacontent="

Tough, but it's our history. In my opinion, every citizen of Latvia should see this film. Indeed, one of the best Latvian films I've ever seen. Yes, some battles, especially the Isle of Death and the Battle of Cesis, could have been more depicted, but the scenes of the Christmas fights were something wow.



The only thing I didn't like was the filming style - I don't know if it was done by purpose, but the camera was very often shaking , and at some moments I wasn't able to enjoy the film by 100%. Especially in fighting scenes.



But it's a great movie all over. 9/10

programme.title: Au Crépuscule
O zmierzchu
Sutemose
programme.desc:
Au Crépuscule (Dusk): Directed by Sharunas Bartas. With Arvydas Dapsys, Marius Povilas Elijas Martynenko, Alina Zaliukaite-Ramanauskiene, Salvijus Trepulis. A historical drama set in Lithuania in 1948, "Au Crépuscule" focuses on Ounté, a 19-year old boy who experiences passion and violence after joining a group of partisans resisting the Soviet occupation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9799640/","name":"Au Crépuscule (Dusk)","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTRiMWE2YmYtMjZmMy00NGM0LThhYTktNGZhNzY5NzRlNGNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjk1NzAxNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A historical drama set in Lithuania in 1948, "Au Crépuscule" focuses on Ounté, a 19-year old boy who experiences passion and violence after joining a group of partisans resisting the Soviet occupation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9799640/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jc666999"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good film - no bias review","reviewBody":"It seems a lot of the reviews on here are politically motivated, which is an abuse of the review and rating system and shouldn't be allowed. I know nothing about lithuanian history and partisans so my opinion is strictly about this film as a film.

It's a pretty good movie, even it it's a bit long and has a lot of what could be consider filler. For example, I don't think the story of the son's real parents matters to the story at all but it did add depth to the characters. Could've spent that time on the partisans instead. The acting is fantastic and made me feel sad for the characters getting killed. It's a depressing story about the changes that come after war.

It looks pretty good too. Nice colors and locations. If this was an american film it would get some award show hype I think.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":214,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-11-29","keywords":"cannes 2020","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1491451929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVlZjU2ZGItZWFmNy00NzE1LTlmNzItZmQxYTY0MjA0ZmM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVlZjU2ZGItZWFmNy00NzE1LTlmNzItZmQxYTY0MjA0ZmM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2056519/","name":"Arvydas Dapsys"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10382563/","name":"Marius Povilas Elijas Martynenko"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9326456/","name":"Alina Zaliukaite-Ramanauskiene"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058401/","name":"Sharunas Bartas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057684/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0335022/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037782/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058401/","name":"Sharunas Bartas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6856660/","name":"Ausra Giedraityte"}],"duration":"PT2H8M"}</script><metacontent="
